Issue.creator: andrey.goncharov
Issue.summary: node_control_tool.py has too wide set of privileges
Issue.description: node_control_tool.py should NOT be run as root (uid==0); it should be run as an account that has elevated privileges to issue calls to apt-get and restart daemons. In other words, it should have limited sudo privileges. If it is run as true root, it is an attack surface.
